original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical link between business operations and technical system configurations, requiring a unique blend of business acumen and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently, with a specific focus on vehicle configuration processes. By leveraging your expertise in data analysis, process optimization, and system configuration, you will play a pivotal role in driving organizational success through the seamless integration of business and technology.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to understand business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques, and translate them into effective technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations to support evolving business needs
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, including active participation in user acceptance testing (UAT)
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and opportunities for process improvement, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration abilities to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in translating business requirements into technical configurations and solutions
- Demonstrated expertise in data analysis, reporting, and visualization techniques to drive data-informed decision-making

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java and SQL programming languages to enhance your technical capabilities
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their practical applications

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business and technical expertise
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems
- Familiarity with agile development methodologies and user-centric design principles

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems or processes
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Skilled in data querying, reporting, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Office)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Agile development methodology, emphasizing iterative improvements and continuous integration
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive project deliverables
- Willingness to adapt to evolving business needs and technology advancements

Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business operations and technical system configurations, requiring a unique blend of analytical thinking, technical expertise, and strong communication skills. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects the complex business processes and requirements of our vehicle configuration space. By leveraging your ability to translate business needs into effective technical solutions, you will play a pivotal role in driving organizational efficiency, productivity, and competitive advantage.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure they are accurately reflected in the system configuration
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations to support the evolving needs of the business
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that requirements are met and the system functions as expected
- Analyze existing data to identify opportunities for process optimization, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in translating business requirements into technical configurations and solutions
- Demonstrated expertise in data analysis, reporting, and visualization techniques to drive data-informed decision-making

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java and SQL programming languages to enhance your technical capabilities
- Understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their practical applications in business process optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business and technical expertise
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems
- Familiarity with agile development methodologies and user-centric design principles

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems or processes
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in a fast-paced, collaborative environment

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Skilled in data querying, reporting, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Office)

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Agile development methodology, emphasizing iterative improvements and continuous integration
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive project deliverables
- Willingness to adapt to evolving business needs and technology advancements, and to take an active role in driving process improvements

Role Overview:
This role is a crucial link between our organization's business operations and the technical configurations of our [mention specific system], requiring a unique blend of analytical thinking, technical expertise, and a deep understanding of the vehicle configuration space. As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for ensuring our systems accurately reflect the complex business requirements and processes, driving organizational efficiency, productivity, and competitive advantage. By leveraging your ability to translate business needs into effective technical solutions, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration capabilities.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure they are accurately reflected in the system configuration
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, data mappings, and integrations to support the evolving needs of the business, including the implementation of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions to drive process optimization
- Implement and thoroughly test new configurations, participating in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that requirements are met and the system functions as expected
- Analyze existing data to identify opportunities for process improvement, leveraging data querying, reporting, and visualization tools to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for optimization
- Proactively recommend and implement configuration changes and best practices to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency, drawing on your expertise in Agile methodologies and user-centric design principles
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing operations and future enhancements
- Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and continuous support of system configurations, fostering a collaborative, cross-functional environment

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to identify and address complex business challenges
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills to effectively translate technical information for non-technical audiences
- Proficiency in translating business requirements into technical configurations and solutions, with a focus on driving process optimization
- Demonstrated expertise in data analysis, reporting, and visualization techniques to drive data-informed decision-making

Preferred Skills:
- Proficiency in Java and SQL programming languages to enhance your technical capabilities
- In-depth understanding of machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) concepts and their practical applications in business process optimization

Required Experience:
- Minimum 5 years of experience in a similar role, blending business and technical expertise, with a focus on vehicle configuration systems
- Proven track record of successfully configuring and maintaining complex enterprise systems, including the implementation of innovative solutions to drive process improvements
- Familiarity with Agile development methodologies and user-centric design principles

Preferred Experience:
- Prior experience working with vehicle configuration systems or processes in a fast-paced, collaborative environment
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies and their application in driving continuous process optimization and system enhancements

Tools & Technologies:
- Proficient in [mention specific system] configuration and administration
- Skilled in data querying, reporting, and visualization tools (e.g., SQL, Tableau, Power BI)
- Familiarity with project management and collaboration tools (e.g., Jira, Confluence, Microsoft Office)
- Experience with implementing ML and AI-driven solutions to optimize business processes

Work Environment & Expectations:
- Highly collaborative, cross-functional team environment with regular stakeholder interactions
- Agile development methodology, emphasizing iterative improvements and continuous integration
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team to drive project deliverables, with a focus on driving process optimization and system enhancements
- Willingness to adapt to evolving business needs and technology advancements, and to take a proactive role in shaping the future of our vehicle configuration capabilities
